lyrics.lyric: Things You Said
lyrics.tlyric: 你说过的话

lyrics.lyric: I was walking in the woods one day
lyrics.tlyric: 有一天梦里 我穿梭在幽暗的森林

lyrics.lyric: Trying to keep the ghosts at bay
lyrics.tlyric: 努力阻止鬼魂向我靠近

lyrics.lyric: Then I thought I saw your face but it was just leaves
lyrics.tlyric: 接着我似乎看到了你的脸 然而只是掠过的树叶

lyrics.lyric: I see you in the strangest things
lyrics.tlyric: 我发现你卷入了最奇异的事情

lyrics.lyric: Your voice in every bird that sings
lyrics.tlyric: 你的声音与鸟儿的歌声汇聚在一起

lyrics.lyric: Can they hear it echoing or is that just me?
lyrics.tlyric: 它们能听见你的回音吗? 难道这是我的错觉？

lyrics.lyric: I don't believe in haunted houses
lyrics.tlyric: 我不相信鬼屋的真实存在

lyrics.lyric: But I still see you there on the bed
lyrics.tlyric: 可我还能清晰地看到 你在床边的身影

lyrics.lyric: You didn't leave me much but the things you said
lyrics.tlyric: 你并没有留下太多东西 除了你说过的话语

lyrics.lyric: They stayed, they stayed
lyrics.tlyric: 遗留了下来 遗留了下来

lyrics.lyric: I was driving through the streets one night
lyrics.tlyric: 有一天晚上 我开车经过熟悉的街道

lyrics.lyric: At the corner with the bar you like
lyrics.tlyric: 在你常去的那家酒吧的拐角处

lyrics.lyric: I thought I saw the car you drive but it wasn't green
lyrics.tlyric: 我好像看到了你开的车 但并不是你那辆绿色

lyrics.lyric: These neighborhoods all look the same
lyrics.tlyric: 这些相似的街区 如此单调沉闷

lyrics.lyric: That's why you had to move away
lyrics.tlyric: 或许这就是你必须搬走的原因

lyrics.lyric: When people ask that's what I say
lyrics.tlyric: 当人们问起这个问题 这便是我的回答

lyrics.lyric: But they know I'm lying
lyrics.tlyric: 可他们知道我在说谎

lyrics.lyric: I don't know who lives in these houses
lyrics.tlyric: 我不知道谁会住进这些房子

lyrics.lyric: But you still live inside of my head
lyrics.tlyric: 但你始终徘徊在我的脑海

lyrics.lyric: You didn't leave me much but the things you said
lyrics.tlyric: 你并没有留下很多东西 但你说过的话语

lyrics.lyric: They stayed, they stayed
lyrics.tlyric: 遗留了下来 遗留了下来

lyrics.lyric: I still see you
lyrics.tlyric: 我依然能看见你

lyrics.lyric: You still see me
lyrics.tlyric: 你也能看见我

lyrics.lyric: But we don't see each other anymore
lyrics.tlyric: 可我们早已不再见面联系

lyrics.lyric: I still love you
lyrics.tlyric: 我依然爱着你

lyrics.lyric: You still love me
lyrics.tlyric: 你也还爱着我

lyrics.lyric: We can't love each other anymore
lyrics.tlyric: 可我们彼此再也无法相爱

lyrics.lyric: Can we?
lyrics.tlyric: 我们还有机会吗？

lyrics.lyric: I don't believe in haunted houses
lyrics.tlyric: 我不相信鬼屋的真实存在

lyrics.lyric: But I still see you there on the bed
lyrics.tlyric: 可我还能清晰地看到 你在床边的身影

lyrics.lyric: I wish I hadn't said all the things I said
lyrics.tlyric: 我多么希望 我没说过那些伤人的话

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作词 : Cody Fry
[00:01.00] 作曲 : Cody Fry
[00:16.99]I was walking in the woods one day
[00:21.08]Trying to keep the ghosts at bay
[00:24.72]Then I thought I saw your face but it was just leaves
[00:31.97]I see you in the strangest things
[00:35.69]Your voice in every bird that sings
[00:39.49]Can they hear it echoing or is that just me?
[00:47.80]
[00:47.81]I don't believe in haunted houses
[00:54.84]But I still see you there on the bed
[01:02.60]You didn't leave me much but the things you said
[01:11.26]They stayed, they stayed
[01:17.32]
[01:23.43]I was driving through the streets one night
[01:27.10]At the corner with the bar you like
[01:31.00]I thought I saw the car you drive but it wasn't green
[01:38.39]These neighborhoods all look the same
[01:42.13]That's why you had to move away
[01:45.84]When people ask that's what I say
[01:48.18]But they know I'm lying
[01:52.98]
[01:54.30]I don't know who lives in these houses
[02:01.23]But you still live inside of my head
[02:08.98]You didn't leave me much but the things you said
[02:17.70]They stayed, they stayed
[02:25.55]
[02:29.48]I still see you
[02:33.21]You still see me
[02:37.56]But we don't see each other anymore
[02:44.17]I still love you
[02:47.86]You still love me
[02:52.45]We can't love each other anymore
[02:57.81]Can we?
[03:00.06]
[03:30.31]I don't believe in haunted houses
[03:37.18]But I still see you there on the bed
[03:45.00]I wish I hadn't said all the things I said

tlyric.lyric:
[by:聿立]
[00:16.99]有一天梦里 我穿梭在幽暗的森林
[00:21.08]努力阻止鬼魂向我靠近
[00:24.72]接着我似乎看到了你的脸 然而只是掠过的树叶
[00:31.97]我发现你卷入了最奇异的事情
[00:35.69]你的声音与鸟儿的歌声汇聚在一起
[00:39.49]它们能听见你的回音吗? 难道这是我的错觉？
[00:47.80]
[00:47.81]我不相信鬼屋的真实存在
[00:54.84]可我还能清晰地看到 你在床边的身影
[01:02.60]你并没有留下太多东西 除了你说过的话语
[01:11.26]遗留了下来 遗留了下来
[01:17.32]
[01:23.43]有一天晚上 我开车经过熟悉的街道
[01:27.10]在你常去的那家酒吧的拐角处
[01:31.00]我好像看到了你开的车 但并不是你那辆绿色
[01:38.39]这些相似的街区 如此单调沉闷
[01:42.13]或许这就是你必须搬走的原因
[01:45.84]当人们问起这个问题 这便是我的回答
[01:48.18]可他们知道我在说谎
[01:52.98]
[01:54.30]我不知道谁会住进这些房子
[02:01.23]但你始终徘徊在我的脑海
[02:08.98]你并没有留下很多东西 但你说过的话语
[02:17.70]遗留了下来 遗留了下来
[02:25.55]
[02:29.48]我依然能看见你
[02:33.21]你也能看见我
[02:37.56]可我们早已不再见面联系
[02:44.17]我依然爱着你
[02:47.86]你也还爱着我
[02:52.45]可我们彼此再也无法相爱
[02:57.81]我们还有机会吗？
[03:00.06]
[03:30.31]我不相信鬼屋的真实存在
[03:37.18]可我还能清晰地看到 你在床边的身影
[03:45.00]我多么希望 我没说过那些伤人的话
